Package org.svvrl.goal.core.wiki

Class Description

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.wiki.Description
All Implemented Interfaces:
Block, Markup
public class Description
extends java.lang.Object
implements Block
This class provides the description of a definition.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
